responses.text: Blocked! But the pin is deadly!
Providence guides our attack—praise the lord, you're doomed!
Heavens! I am forsaken—god damn it!
Blocked! But the spirit is strong!
The {capturedPiece} is removed from my presence.
Che spettacolo! What a show—you're finished!
Blocked! But the cut is deep!
Liberté totale! Total freedom—va te faire enculer!
Blocked? I will find a way.
